abstract: Nearly 350 of 592 students at prestigious New York City private school Ethical Culture Fieldston School in Bronx sign petition to reinstate teacher Barry Sirmon, who was fired by school head Damian Fernandez for remarks that some students perceived to be racist.
snippet: A teacher who had been at the prestigious New York City private school for 11 years was fired for comments to students that he said were perceived by some as racist.
lead_paragraph: A teacher who had been at the prestigious New York City private school for 11 years was fired for comments to students that he said were perceived by some as racist.

headline.main: At Fieldston School, Division Over the Dismissal of a Popular but Polarizing Teacher

headline.seo: Firing at Ethical Culture Fieldston School Prompts Outcry
